posts.postText: I muted a guy and he just kept talking, I tried the same to myself and it didn't stop me from typing.

>> I muted a guy and he just kept talking, I tried the same to myself and it didn't stop me from typing. 
I concur, I noticed this yesterday and wondered if it was a one time occurrence

Strange.
I can upload the ULX SVN?
Unless we have something custom in there....

>> Ben":awj3kwpm]Strange.
I can upload the ULX SVN?
Unless we have something custom in there.... 
It's the New Chatbox Shadow uploaded. Nothing he isn't working on.

>> Ben":27z659ae]Strange.
I can upload the ULX SVN?
Unless we have something custom in there.... 
Your "SVN" breaks ulx all together, don't do it. It's the chat box, it stops people from sending the message, then sends a custom message with their name on it, then prints it to the console in the same colors. So the message, technically, isn't "sent" anyway. Muting won't do a damn thing :P
